mapper.sql:
FROM infrMember a LEFT JOIN infrMemberPhone b ON a.ifmmSeq = b.ifmmSeq LEFT JOIN infrmemberEmail c ON a.ifmmSeq = c.ifmmSeq WHERE 1=1
AND a.regDateTime LIKE concat('%',#{shJoinValue},'%')
AND a.ifmmName LIKE concat('%',#{shValue}, '%') AND a.ifmmId LIKE concat('%',#{shValue}, '%') AND b.ifmpNumber LIKE concat('%',#{shValue}, '%') AND c.ifmeEmailFull LIKE concat('%',#{shValue}, '%')
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM infrMember WHERE 1=1 AND ifmmSeq = #{ifmmSeq}
